response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This item holds immense value to us, but recognizing its potential worth to you, we believe it could be a perfect match for your needs and aspirations. We propose to sell this product to you for $950,000. This price reflects not only the intrinsic value of the product but also the significant savings compared to its market value of $1,200,000. We are confident that this offer presents a unique chance for both parties to benefit. Please let us know if you require any additional information or have any questions. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
